twoSetSkill.name: Tenacity 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Each 15 non-Charged ATK gives a Charged ATK buff: Next Charged ATK and following Charged ATK for 5s gain 60% Total DMG Multiplier. Count ends after the buff ends. Host directly gains Charged ATK buff when entering battle (triggers 1 time per battle).

threeSetSkill.name: Anti-Entropy 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Gain 40% Ice DMG. For 16s after casting the Ultimate, Charged ATKs will generate a 3s Gravity Vortex that pulls-in nearby enemies. CD: 4s.
